about_the_game:
While this is a prequel to2236 A.D. it is not required to play 2236 A.D. first before playing this game. It is simply a free game to appreciate the fact that Masuko is cute.

STORY

This is a story about Masuko, the Personal A.I. Secretary System (PASS) for Smart Tools* and her owner, Yotsuba.
The day is January 1, 2236 A.D. and the start of the year hasn't gone as well as it could have.
(*It's a really awesome smartphone)

This is a nonsensical story between man and AI that seems heartwarming but may not actually be heartwarming.
There are laughs but there aren't really any tears but in any case, it is a visual novel about how Masuko is cute.

Features

  • Single route visual novel featuring characters from 2236 A.D.
  • English and Japanese language options
  • Windows and Mac OS compatible.

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains some suggestive language and mature themes not suitable for all audiences.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11 El Capitan or higher
  • Processor: Any 64 bit processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: 2236 A.D. Secretary Stories

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 32/64-bit Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

short_description: A prequel to 2236 A.D. which features a nonsensical story between man and AI that seems heartwarming but may actually be heartwarming. In other words, it's a visual novel about how Masuko is cute.
